section.name: Magnolia SVN List
section.p: If you wish to be notified of changes committed to the versioning system, simply send an empty mail to svn-list-on@magnolia.info You can cancel at any time.

You can unsubscribe at any time by sending an empty email to svn-list-off@magnolia.info
To switch to the DIGEST mode, send an empty email to svn-list-digest@magnolia.info
To switch to the INDEX mode, send an empty email to svn-list-index@magnolia.info
For any administrative enquieries, please use svn-list-request@magnolia.info

section.name: View the SVN repository online
section.p: The view-cvs system has been installed, please check it out at http://svn.magnolia.info/view/
